<Text: 2010–11 Old Dominion Monarchs basketball team:  They finished the season 27–7, 14–4 in CAA play and were champions of the 2011 CAA Men's Basketball Tournament to earn an automatic bid to the 2011 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament where they lost in the second round to Butler.>
